EmailTemplate.subject: Revisit Turbonomic (1494247858.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hello Laura,Hope you were able to enjoy the weekend! I wanted to get in touch with you to see if we could connect over the phone for a few minutes. I think it would make sense to take a few minutes and learn how Turbonomic is changing the way we manage our virtual environments while also cutting down on HW and licensing costs by 37%. Do you have time this week to connect? Thank you,Katie Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
